name: Control (itch) (Rover3672)
description:
After you and your childhood best friend return to school later after winter break, you find the campus eerily empty...what happened to everyone? Attempt to control your demise as you try to find a way to save campus. At least you think you can save them... 

This is my first game that I've ever made! Had lots of fun and hope you enjoy it as much as I do <3
